sentences.sentence: China announces the end of three days of drills encircling Taiwan.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: At least five people have been killed in southeast France after an avalanche struck the Alps on Sunday. One person is still missing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: More bodies have been found in the rubble of a building that collapsed after a major explosion in the French port city of Marseille China has announced the end of three days of drills in circling Taiwan the declaration came after the Taiwanese Defense Ministry had reported multiple encroachments of warships into its tacitly accepted waters with no intention to escalate the situation the RC armed forces will uphold our sovereignty and maintain our national security in a composed rational rational and thoughtful manner. Meanwhile, our air defence units have remained on high alert.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Beijing says the drills were intended to build up peace and stability and as a warning against any move by Taiwan to claim formal independence. We hope that the international community fully understands the reality of Taiwan's problems, and that it will firmly abide by one of the principles of China, and that it will firmly oppose the division of Taiwan and its countries in various forms.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Analysts say China's goal was to intimidate Taiwan by simulating an economic blockade.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Russia has offered its support to Beijing, saying China had been provoked.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: At least six people are dead and several others injured after an avalanche struck the French

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Alps on Sunday. The snowfall took place shortly before noon near the Arm-en-Seth glacier on Mont Blanc, outside of resorts dedicated to winter sports. While the region is prone to avalanches, officials say this was one of the deadliest in years. Authorities say the death toll includes two mountain guides from Saint-Gervais. A sixth fatality was announced on Monday after authorities said they were still searching for a missing person.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Three bodies have been pulled from the rubble of a building that collapsed in Marseille after a violent explosion in the early hours of Sunday morning.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Five other people remain unaccounted for and the city's mayor says search operations are ongoing to find those who are still missing. Les gens restent sans compte. Et le maire de la ville dit que les op√©rations de recherche sont en cours pour trouver ceux qui sont encore en manque. The four-storey building located in Marseille's city centre was brought down by the explosion just before 1am.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The cause of the explosion is still to be determined, but investigators are looking at the possibility of a gas leak while russia continues to focus on seizing ukraine's industrial east two other provinces harkiv in the northeast and zaparisia in the southeast came under missile fire on sunday residential areas have been hit including a cluster of houses where a child was among the casualties in his nightly address president Vladimir Zelensky referred to the strike on Zaporizhia saying that Russia puts itself in even greater isolation from the world and from humanity by hitting a house in Zaporizhia on the Orthodox Church's Palm Sunday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The vast majority of Ukrainians with a religious affiliation identify as Orthodox Christians, a faith that observes Easter on April 16 this year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Some Catholics celebrated Easter on Sunday, while Orthodox churches marked Palm Sunday this weekend.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, the Ukrainian Air Force released for the first time footage of the National Advanced Service to Air Missile Systems being operated. The video claimed that over five months of combat operations, Ukrainian NASAMs have destroyed over 100 enemy missiles and drones.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Moscow may try to use the upcoming Orthodox Easter holiday on the 16th of April to delay Ukrainian counter-offensives by calling for a ceasefire out of respect for religion, the Institute for the Study of War says in its daily update.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The Kremlin has selectively called for ceasefires around religious holidays to influence the situation on the front lines.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Moscow, for example, refused a ceasefire during Orthodox Easter in 2022, quote, in order not to give the Kiev nationalists a break, unquote, during the Battle of Mariupol.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The U.S. think tank says the Kremlin likely refused a ceasefire because Russian forces still held the initiative on the front lines at the time but so this is five months later over Orthodox Christmas to obtain additional time to prepare Russian forces for winter offensive now the Kremlin may call for an Easter ceasefire because such a pause would disproportionately benefit Russian troops and allow them to secure their gains in urban Bakhmut and to prepare defenses against Ukraine's spring counteroffensive Ukrainian and Russian sources discussed the decreased rate of Russian offensive operations along the entire frontline over the past weekend Russian forces continued to conduct ground attacks in and around Bakhmut and on the Avdiivka Donetsk City line Russian forces likely made marginal gains in southern Bakhmut and on the Avdiivka Donetsk city line. Russian forces likely made marginal gains in southern Bakhmut.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The defence ministry says over the last seven days, Russia has likely increased its armoured assaults around the Donetsk region town of Marinka.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: This is about 20 kilometres south-west of Donetsk city.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Marinka has been fought over since 2014 and has been largely destroyed by artillery exchanges. It commenced the approaches to Donetsk and the Key Road. Russia continues to give a high priority to resourcing operations in the broader Donetsk sector including the Marinka and Avdiivka areas, expanding significant resources for minimal gains. The Institute for the Study of war says the dynamics of battlefield artillery usage in ukraine reflect the fact that russian forces are using artillery to offset their degraded offensive capabilities russia is considering lifting its ban on twitter after the social media network reinstated access to accounts of Russian state agencies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The ban was imposed before Elon Musk took over running Twitter, but since Friday users can once again search on the Kremlin and other official accounts.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: accounts. Reacting to the development, a senior Russian MP on the Duma's Information Policy Committee has called on the country's media watchdog to consider ending its restriction on Twitter.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Separately, the BBC has complained to Twitter after its main account was labelled government-funded media.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The broadcaster insisted it was financed by the public and independent from the government.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: In response, Musk reportedly emailed the BBC saying that all media organisations have some level of bias, but added that he viewed the corporation as among the least biased.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Influencer Andrew Tate and his brother Tristan have been questioned by Romanian prosecutors and had their electronic devices searched.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: It's the first time the two brothers have left house arrest, where they were placed more than a week ago after being released from a three-month-long detention.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Tate and his younger brother and two Romanian women are under investigation

sentences.sentence: for alleged human trafficking and rape the Dalai Lama has apologized after a video showing him kissing a child on the mouth and asking him to suck on his tongue went viral on Twitter a statement posted on Tibetan Buddhist Buddhist leader's account said that His Holiness often teases people he meets in an innocent and playful way, and that he regrets the incident.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The boy asked if he could hug him.

sentences.sentence: The Tibetan spiritual leader then invited him onto the platform when the incident took place.
